# Vinvel Motor Trading

Vinvel Motor Trading is a vehicle sourcing/import service focused on Japan-sourced vehicles and customer handovers.

## Canonical site
https://vinvelmotors.com/

## Key pages
- Home: https://vinvelmotors.com/
- Cars: https://vinvelmotors.com/cars.html
- Auctions: https://vinvelmotors.com/auction.html
- Broker showroom: https://vinvelmotors.com/broker.html

## Policies
- Privacy Policy: https://vinvelmotors.com/privacy.html
- Terms & Conditions: https://vinvelmotors.com/tnc.html
- Auction Disclaimer: https://vinvelmotors.com/auction_disclaimer.html

## Contact
- Email: hello@vinvelmotors.com
- WhatsApp: https://wa.me/94714878393
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/vinvelsl
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/vinvel_motors

## Crawling notes
- This site is a static website.
- Public pages are listed in the sitemap: https://vinvelmotors.com/sitemap.xml
